text: Roshson Cañete Barman or simply as Rosh Barman, (born on May 25, 1997 in Biliran, Philippines) is a Filipino–Indian actor and model, He is best known for his role as Jeffrey in the movie of Bubot sa Kagubatan in 2023.https://peoplaid.com/2021/05/25/rosh-barmanHe is currently seen at the Primtime evening at FPJ's Batang Quiapo at Kapamilya Channel. ==Career== In 2022 he played the role as Errol in a Chinese family anthology series Mano po Legacy and the Philippine film horror Shake Rattle & Roll: Extreme as the Infected farmer in the "Rage" segment. ==Filmography== ===Television=== * 2023–2024 – Regal Studio Presents as Ompong & Greg * 2023 – Lovers & Liars as Pends * 2022 – Mano po Legacy: The Flower as Errol * 2021 – A Girl & a Guy ===Movies=== * 2023 - Bubot sa Kagubatan as Jeffrey * 2023 – Shake Rattle & Roll: Extreme as Infected farmer * 2023 – Triggered * 2020 – My Day as Jake ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino people Category:Indian people Category:Filipino actors Category:Filipino models Category:Indian models
title: Rosh Barman
